name: Voltstrider
description: Voltstrider is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its cat-shaped box body and soldier-like buttons for arms and legs, Voltstrider combines flexibility and precision. Its screen displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, showcasing its sophisticated electronics and display capabilities. This unique combination of traits makes Voltstrider a formidable member of the WebtrES club, capable of analyzing complex data and providing real-time insights.
